description: Comprehensive NGINX web analytics with GeoIP mapping

targets.expr: (sum(count_over_time({job="nginx_access", website=~"$website"} | json | status >= 500 [$__range])) or vector(0)) / (sum(count_over_time({job="nginx_access", website=~"$website"} [$__range])) + 0.0001) * 100
topk(50, sum by (geoip_city_name, geoip_location_latitude, geoip_location_longitude) (count_over_time({job="nginx_access", website=~"$website"} | json | __error__="" [$__range])))

topk(25, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({job="nginx_access", website=~"$website"} | json | __error__="" | http_referer != "-" | http_referer !~ ".*(teck-global|lucidsteps|genohedges|precisionmedlnc|theailotto|teckglobal).*" [$__range])))

topk(15, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({job="nginx_access", website=~"$website"} | json | __error__="" | http_user_agent =~ ".*(bot|Bot|crawler|Crawler|spider|Spider|slurp|Googlebot|Bingbot|Baiduspider|YandexBot|DuckDuckBot).*" [$__range])))

title: NGINX Web Analytics
